title: I was told to come here

What does this mean? I sent a message to riot telling them that I did not request a password change on my account, and now it doesn't even show that on the ticket, and any information I put in there is redacted.

replies.body: Additional information: The email was received at 5:53 pm today, wherein my password was reset while I was online. My email doesn't appear to have been hacked, as the message was unopened and I was able to log in to the account using the new password. I logged out soon after, and will not log in again until this error is addressed for clarity. I own all the champions and runes and a few skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZyYcoIv9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-25T05:39:58.862+0000)
>
> Additional information: The email was received at 5:53 pm today, wherein my password was reset while I was online. My email doesn't appear to have been hacked, as the message was unopened and I was able to log in to the account using the new password. I logged out soon after, and will not log in again until this error is addressed for clarity. I own all the champions and runes and a few skins.

I changed my password to something else because there is no log in history or changed password attempts just for security purposes until you can assist me. Of course I am willing to give you any information you may need to verify my identity. Thanks.

This sounds like a really strange situation and unclear, as I'm really not sure what all the redacted are.  If someone might be trying to get a hold of your account, then it was good that you changed your password.  I also recommend using our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your info outside of league is secure as well.  

If you're having any issues or need context your account then hit us up in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) (which is different from a normal ticket).  Our Account team will be happy to help individually, which is not something we can do here no a private forum.  Good luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZyYcoIv9,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-25T17:03:33.059+0000)
>
> This sounds like a really strange situation and unclear, as I'm really not sure what all the redacted are.  If someone might be trying to get a hold of your account, then it was good that you changed your password.  I also recommend using our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your info outside of league is secure as well.  
> 
> If you're having any issues or need context your account then hit us up in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) (which is different from a normal ticket).  Our Account team will be happy to help individually, which is not something we can do here no a private forum.  Good luck!

It turns out y'all were taking a proactive approach to making sure I am really myself, so thanks. My account is safe. I think it's been sorted out now. :)
